Package game.bonusGame

Class WaterTreeAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
      • game.bonusGame.WaterTreeAction
  • public class WaterTreeAction
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
    This class represents the Action that waters the stone tree
    Author:
    Team Kimchi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String execute​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      Performs the Action of watering the stone tree Replaces the skill BonusGameSkills.BUCKETISFULL to BonusGameSkills.BUCKETISEMPTY to indicate that the bucket is emptied There is a 50% chance of dropping stones, -If the stone tree is not fertilised, player's stone counter increments by 1 , returns a message that one stone is added -Else, player's stone counter increments by 2, returns a message that two stones are added If no stones is dropped, returns a message that no stones has been added
      java.lang.String hotKey()
      Returns the empty String, as no hotKey is permanently assigned to WaterTreeAction.
      java.lang.String menuDescription​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
      Returns a String description for displaying in the menu, which is waters the tree

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.String execute​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Performs the Action of watering the stone tree Replaces the skill BonusGameSkills.BUCKETISFULL to BonusGameSkills.BUCKETISEMPTY to indicate that the bucket is emptied There is a 50% chance of dropping stones, -If the stone tree is not fertilised, player's stone counter increments by 1 , returns a message that one stone is added -Else, player's stone counter increments by 2, returns a message that two stones are added If no stones is dropped, returns a message that no stones has been added
        Specified by:
        execute in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        map - the map that actor is currently on.
        Returns:
        A String describing that n number of stones has been added to the actor's inventory

      • menuDescription

        public java.lang.String menuDescription​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor)
        Returns a String description for displaying in the menu, which is waters the tree
        Specified by:
        menuDescription in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
        Parameters:
        actor - The actor performing the action.
        Returns:

      • hotKey

        public java.lang.String hotKey()

        Specified by:

        Returns:
